text: The freshman class moves into their dorms. A head of state lectures on campus. A faculty member makes a pioneering discovery. Harvard’s photo and multimedia team captures it all. This section provides the following resources:
gallery of images for use by media

In accordance with University policy, photographers and videographers must request a permit to film or photograph the campus. If you have questions about Harvard's filming policies, please contact HPAC at (617) 495-1585.
